content: Today, I compiled a list of useful topics on my favourite casino games - Slot, Dice, and Blackjack. These topics were gotten from the ‘Gambling Discussion’ board. My goal was to collect topics that would serve as guides for beginners and other casino lovers. So, I didn’t focus too much on the numerous topics narrating personal experiences or asking questions about the games. If you are new to the casino or a veteran, I hope you find these resources as educative and informative as I did.SLOT Slots 101: Basics, Strategies, and Discussion (with poll)  (by mu_enrico) Slots 102: The Provably Fair Slots (with poll)  (by mu_enrico) Slots 103: More In-Depth about Return To Player (RTP) (With Poll)  (by mu_enrico) Slots 104: Fishing Game/Arcade - Like Slots but More Action! (by mu_enrico) INFOGRAPHIC: Online Slot Gaming Tips from Veteran Players  (by ruthwithers1980) Slots is More Likely to Cause Gambling Problem  (by lionheart78)DICE Top 5 Bitcoin Dice Strategy Guide: How to Win at Crypto Dice  (by Coinbox1) How to play dice: Strategy with BTC  (by Coinbox1)BLACKJACK Video Course of BlackJack for people who want to learn BlackJack  (by jcojci) Blackjack Discussion * Different Types of Live Blackjack(Evolution Gaming)  (by dimonstration) Blackjack Discussion Official Discussion and Lounge  (by Coin_trader)*Edit: I added two more topics to the blackjack list which I missed earlier. It was suggested by @ralle14
